Package es.uam.eps.ir.relison.index

Class GenericIndex<T>

java.lang.Object
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.index.GenericIndex<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the element.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GenericIndex<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Bi-map-like structure to back fast version of indexes. It keeps to maps: id-to-index and index-to-id. Value of indexes go from 0 (included) to the number of elements (excluded).
Author:
Javier Sanz-Cruzado (javier.sanz-cruzado@uam.es), Craig Macdonald (craig.macdonald@glasgow.ac.uk), Iadh Ounis (iadh.ounis@glasgow.ac.uk), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es), SaÃºl Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)
See Also:
